machine_id.comment: An identifier provided by VS Code to relate coding sessions from the same installation together

extension.comment: The name of the Database Client extension

version.comment: The version of the Database Client extension

code_version.comment: The version of VS Code running the extension

remote_name.comment: The 'remoteName' from VS Code (such as 'ssh' or 'docker' for remote workspaces)

is_dev.comment: Whether the extension is running in development mode

os.comment: The platform/OS the extension is running on

app_name.comment: The name of the editor application (usually VS Code, but could be another editor that runs VS Code extensions such as from open-vsix)

app_host.comment: The hosted location of the application

language.comment: Represents the preferred user-language, like `de-CH`, `fr`, or `en-US`.

is_new.comment: Whether the new user to install Database Client.

db_type.comment: The target service type of the connection.
